definition: Greed is the root of all evil.
pinyin: tan1 lan2 shi4 wan4 e4 zhi1 yuan2

definition: Money is the root of all evil.
pinyin: qian2 shi4 wan4 e4 zhi1 yuan2

sentences.english: Some great man said money is the source of all money.
sentences.chinese: 某個偉人說過金錢是萬惡之源。

sentences.english: Money is the root of all evil.
sentences.chinese: 對金錢的愛是萬惡之源。

sentences.english: Whether is money the origin of good or evil has been a long-time-discussed topic.
sentences.chinese: 金錢到底是萬惡之源還是萬善之源已經被討論了很久。

sentences.english: Diligence is the mother of success, idleness is the root of all evil.
sentences.chinese: 勤奮是成功之母，懶惰乃萬惡之源。

sentences.english: The source that says contest price rank is extremely evil is not beyond the mark .
sentences.chinese: 說競價排名是萬惡之源一點都不過分。

sentences.english: So you think that money is the root of all evil.
sentences.chinese: 既然你認爲金錢是萬惡之源。

sentences.english: Money is not the root of all evils as is usually claimed.
sentences.chinese: 金錢並非像平常說的那樣是萬惡之源。

sentences.english: Idleness is the root (or mother) of all evil (or sin or vice).
Money is not, as is usually said, the origin of all evils.
sentences.chinese: 金錢並非像平常說的那樣是萬惡之源。
